    if(0x00 == PID) {
        // We're capable of pulling *anything* out of our collective asses!
        *A = 0xFF;
        *B = 0xFF;
        *C = 0xFF;
        *D = 0xFE;
        return 4;
    }
    if(0x20 <= PID) return 0;

        if(cmd->bytes_returned > 4) {
            // Not really ideal...
            return 4;
        }
        return cmd->bytes_returned;
    }

    return 4;
